comments.comment: SLC wasting their time by giving continuous chances to failed cricketers. We have to find good team for 2019 world cup. Only one year left. How many matches we are left with? Think about recently concluded pakistan ODIs. They couldn't find a single talent from 5 matches because they used same failed players. Way to go SLC more whitewashes are on your way.

When you look at the players now, they look bunch of weed smokers or Thugs. Do not shave their beards and looks like real madaviyas. There is a saying that your face showcases your hear. Can you imagine the caliber of cricketers we have had. Roy, Duleep, Rumesh, Madugalle, Wettimuni, Roshan, Arjuna, Hashan, All were pleasant and extremely talented than this bunch and moreover they had discipline to shave their beards and look like gentlemen. These players are not bothered about it and certainly look like loiterers and no talent inside as well. We should over haul our cricket with a new structure plus discipline to represent them the Nation in the International arena. Not like this. Think a second........
Haraka wenuwata team ekai board ekai geta gahamu
Ara anuradhapure meniyo danne monatada.... gowiyanta polimak dannada

guys..cricket is just a sport like others..actually we are nt goot at sports..only we had cricket because it is widely spreaded in schools..problems is our skills are behind the international magic level..  we must find tru skilled cricketers from all the country.  our fast bolling players are nt the right men that we are training for..they are very weak in mind and body.  actually we hv good batters but they are so panic and careless in tough game..  and we are sri lankans..we believe in astrology, seems our selectors are nt considering the good and bad time of players tru their heroscope..we must use all tangible and untangible power to beat our oppesition.  mind it
Tisara wage moda majarayoth ekka oyagamana yanna be'boruwata test one day/.20/20 kiya wen karanne netuwa fome eke inna ayath ekka gamana ya utui

Players are running behind monies Coaches favouring low level players just fir their survival. Politicians are not doing anything as they concern only hiw to gain the power next time. We are failures in all the aareas. Very sad sri lanka.

Ranatunge.s at Sri Lanka Cricket robbed funds, neglected school level, didnt get good coaches, didnt maintain decepline & therefore what can we expect better for the state of CRICKET in SRI LANKA TODAY?  Cricket needs continues follow mup, training, investment in many ways at school, club, national, international level. The money of SLC was used for other & not for CRICKET.
People who love cricket will never do like this.
People who love cricket should be in charge of cricket.
Who love present day SL cricket.

That's true but it was not like that earlier. But now I dont know what has happen. What to do? There are people who love cricket but not the present team of sri lanka. I've put this comment to people who play outside the sri lankan team.
